name: Attack
note:
La compétence #1 sera utilisée lorsque
vous sélectionnerez la commande Attaque.

name: Defend
note:
La compétence #2 sera utilisée lorsque
vous sélectionnerez la commande Garde.

name: -- MAGIC LOWER LEVEL
note:
Below is the list of all the basic spells
using elements.
Basic spells are low level and low rank
spells, doing a few damage but with a low
MP cost.

description: A basic spell using fire.
name: Fire Shot
note:
Basic spell of Fire.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using thunder.
name: Thundervolt
note:
Basic spell of Thunder.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using ice.
name: Freeze
note:
Basic spell of Ice.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using water.
name: Water Torrent
note:
Basic spell of Water.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using earth.
name: Smasher
note:
Basic spell of Earth.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using wind.
name: Wind Cutters
note:
Basic spell of Wind.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using light.
message1: cast a flash of divine light !
name: Light
note:
Basic spell of Light.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using darkness.
name: Nightmare
note:
Basic spell of Darkness.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using arcane.
message1: cast an explosion of arcane energy !
name: Arcane Blow
note:
Basic spell of Arcane.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using life in an offensive way.
name: Life
note:
Basic spell of Life.
Low cost, low damage, small HP recovery.

description: A basic spell using death.
message1: shred the enemy soul and absorb a part !
name: Death
note:
Basic spell of Death.
Low cost, low damage, small HP recovery.

name: -- HEALING L1
note:
Below is the list of all the spells
related to healing.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a small amount of HP to
a single ally.
message1: use some energy for healing wounds !
name: Heal
note:
Basic Healing spell.
Give to the target a small amount of HP.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a small amount of HP to
all allies.
message1: use some energy for healing all wounds !
name: Mass Heal
note:
Mass version of the Heal spell.
Less powerful and giving less HP, it heal
all the group.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a medium amount of HP to
a single ally.
message1: use some energy for healing wounds !
name: Enforced Heal
note:
Second level of Healing spell.
More effective. Give back a medium amount of
HP but cost more MP.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a medium amount of HP to
all allies.
message1: use some energy for healing all wounds !
name: Enforced Mass Heal
note:
Second level of Mass Healing spell.
More effective, give back more HP but cost
more MP.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a large amount of HP to
a single ally.
message1: use some energy for healing wounds !
name: Mighty Heal
note:
Last level of Healing spell.
More effective. Give back a high amount of
HP but cost a lot MP.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a large amount of HP to
all allies.
message1: use some energy for healing all wounds !
name: Mighty Mass Heal
note:
Last level of Mass Healing spell.
More effective. Give back a high amount of
HP but cost a lot MP.

description:
A neutral spell able to bring back to consciousness
a knocked out ally with half HP.
name: Reanimation
note:
Basic Ressurection spell.
Bring back to life a KOed ally with 50% HP.

description:
A neutral spell able to bring back to consciousness
a knocked out ally with full HP.
name: Ressurection
note:
Basic Ressurection spell.
Bring back to life a KOed ally with 100% HP.

name: -- MAGIC MEDIUM-HIGH LEVEL
note:
Below is the list of all the spells
using elements classified as "++"
"++" spells are medium-high level/rank
spells, doing more damages but with a higher
MP cost

description:
A stronger spell using fire. Small chance to burn
target and deal damage over time.
name: Fireball
note:
Second spell of Fire.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Burn target.

description:
A stronger spell using thunder. Small chance to stun
target, making it eventually unable to act.
name: Lightning
note:
Second spell of Thunder.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Stun target.

description:
A stronger spell using ice. Small chance to freeze
target, making it unable to act.
name: Ice Spikes
note:
Second spell of Ice.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Freeze target.

description:
A stronger spell using water. Small chance to slow
target and delay its action turn.
name: Water Stream
note:
Second spell of Water.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Slow target.

description:
A stronger spell using earth. Small chance to stun
target, making it eventually unable to act.
name: Blaster
note:
Second spell of Earth.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Stun target.

description:
A stronger spell using wind. Small chance to slow
target and delay its action turn.
name: Wirldwind
note:
Second spell of Wind.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Slow target.

description:
A stronger spell using light. Small chance to blind
target, increasing chances to miss.
message1: cast a flash of divine light !
name: Light++
note:
Second spell of Light.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Blind target.

description:
A stronger spell using darkness. Small chance to
confuse target, making it able to attack its allies.
name: Darkness++
note:
Second spell of Darkness.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Confuse target.

description:
A pulse of arcane energy to strike the target.
Inflicts a chance to mute the enemy.
message1: cast a bolt of arcane energy !
name: Arcane Pulse
note:
Second spell of Arcane.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Mute target.

description:
A stronger spell using life. Small chance to blind
target, increasing chances to miss.
name: Life++
note:
Second spell of Life.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Blind target.
Better HP recovery.

description:
A stronger spell using ice. Small chance to freeze
target, making it unable to act.
message1: shred the enemy soul and absorb a part !
name: Death++
note:
Second spell of Death.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Freeze target.
Better HP recovery.

name: -- MAGIC AOE MEDIUM-LEVEL
note:
Below is the list of all the basic mass 
spells using elements, also called "O"
spells.
"O" spells are low-medium level/rank
spells, doing a few damage but with a medium
MP cost and touching all targets.

description: A mass spell using fire. Touch all targets.
name: Fire Storm
note:
Third spell of Fire.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using thunder. Touch all targets.
name: Thunder
note:
Third spell of Thunder.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using ice. Touch all targets.
name: Ice Spears
note:
Third spell of Ice.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using water. Touch all targets.
name: Tidal Rage
note:
Third spell of Water.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using earth. Touch all targets.
name: Stone Spears
note:
Third spell of Earth.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using wind. Touch all targets.
name: Tornado
note:
Third spell of Wind.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using light. Touch all targets.
name: Light O
note:
Third spell of Light.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using darkness. Touch all targets.
name: Darkness O
note:
Third spell of Darkness.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description:
A wave of arcane energy targeted to all enemies.
Small chance to mute targets.
name: Arcane Wave
note:
Third spell of Arcane.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description:
A mass spell using life. Touch all targets.
Drain a small amount of HP to all targets.
name: Life O
note:
Third spell of Life.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.
Small drain to each target.

description:
A mass spell using death. Touch all targets.
Drain a small amount of HP to all targets.
name: Death O
note:
Third spell of Death.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.
Small drain to each target.

name: -- MAGIC AOE HIGH-LEVEL
note:
Below is the list of all the basic mass 
spells using elements, also called "X"
spells.
"X" spells are medium-high level/rank
spells, doing a medium damage but with
a high MP cost and touching all targets.
They also have a small chance to inflict
status.

description:
A powerful mass spell using fire. Touch all targets.
Small chance to burn.
name: Blazing Wall
note:
Last spell of Fire.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to burn.

description:
A powerful mass spell using thunder. Touch all targets.
Small chance to stun.
name: Lightning Storm
note:
Last spell of Thunder.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to stun.

description:
A powerful mass spell using ice. Touch all targets.
Small chance to freeze targets.
name: Blizzard
note:
Last spell of Ice.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to freeze.

description:
A powerful mass spell using water. Touch all targets.
Small chance to slow targets.
name: Tidal Summon
note:
Last spell of Water.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to slow.

description:
A powerful mass spell using earth. Touch all targets.
Small chance to stun targets.
name: Earthquake
note:
Last spell of Earth.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to stun.

description:
A powerful mass spell using wind. Touch all targets.
Small chance to slow targets.
name: Ethereal Blades
note:
Last spell of Wind.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to slow.

description: A powerful mass spell using light. Touch all targets.
name: Light X
note:
Last spell of Fire.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to blind.

description:
A powerful mass spell using darkness. Touch all targets.
Small chance to confuse targets.
name: Darkness X
note:
Last spell of Darkness.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to confuse.

description:
A powerful arcane mass explosion.
Good chance to mute targets.
name: Arcane Blast
note:
Last spell of Arcane.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to mute.

description:
A powerful mass spell using life. Touch all targets.
Drain a medium amount of HP to all targets. Can blind.
name: Life X
note:
Last spell of Life.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Medium drain to each target
Small chance to blind.

description:
A powerful mass spell using death. Touch all targets.
Drain medium amount of HP to all targets. Can instakill.
name: Death X
note:
Last spell of Life.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Medium drain to each target
Very small chance to kill.

message1: attempts to grab some party member!
name: Assault Ivy Maiden

message1: throws her vines against the party!
name: Aassault Alraune

message1: slips her limbs to trap some party member!
name: Aassault Myconids

message1: attempts to trap a party member!
name: Aassault Lamia

message1: attempts to daze some party member!
name: Aassault Fairies

message1: attempts to grab some unfortunate girl with its vines!
name: Aassault PumpkinFiend

message1: webs a trap against the party!
name: Aassault Black Widow
-- MONSTER SKILLS --
note:
Below is the list of all the basic skills
using physical element.
Physic skills use TP instead of MP
and requiere a weapon for being used in
most cases.

message1: attempts to catch her target with her vines!
name: Vine Attack

message1: attempts to catch her target with her vines!
name: Root
-- SPECIAL SKILLS --
note:
Below is the list of all the basic skills
using physical element.
Physic skills use TP instead of MP
and requiere a weapon for being used in
most cases.

description:
Fills up the mana pool up to 20%
by using 1/4 TP points
name: Addrenaline Shot

description:
Fills up the mana pool up to 50%
by using 1/2 TP points
name: Addrenaline Boost

description: Replenishes the mana bar when TP bar is full
name: Addrenaline Rage

description: Disabled ATM
name: Dominate
note:
Capture the battler IDS and then cast
Tickling Assault

description: KILL'EM ALL!!
name: BLAST
note: Special skill for debug mode

description: Below are skills mainly for swordsmen to use.
name: -----　Swordsman & Warrior Skills

description: Performs a powerful attack on an enemy.
name: Strong Attack

description: Attacks all enemies.
name: Slash

description: Performs an attack on an enemy twice.
name: Dual Attack

description:
Rouses the user’s fighting spirit and increases 
attack. Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Willpower

description: Recovers an ally’s HP.
name: First Aid

description: Performs a super powerful attack on an enemy.
name: Maiden's Stance

description: Performs a powerful attack on all enemies.
name: Spin Crash

description:
Below are skills mainly for knights to use. 
(Weapons are mostly spears.)
name: -----　Knight Skills

description: Automatically protects allies with low HP for 1 turn.
name: Protect

description:
Performs an attack on an enemy faster than anyone 
else.
name: Falcon Thrust

description: Performs an attack on an enemy twice.
name: Double Thrust

description: Inflicts damage on all enemies regardless of defense.
name: Armor Piercer

description:
Rouses all allies’ fighting spirit and increases 
attack. Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Battle Cry

description: Attacks all enemies.
name: Windmill

description: Slightly increases the user’s TP.
name: Clear Mind

description: Randomly performs 4 attacks on 4 enemies.
name: Wild Thrust

description: Below are skills mainly for bandits to use.
name: -----　Bandit Skills

description: Blinds an enemy.
name: Eye Poke

description: Increases the user’s agility.
name: Warm-up

description: Blinds all enemies.
name: Flare

description:
Increases items and money gained from battle for 
a while.
name: Watchful Eye

description: Inflicts huge damage on all enemies.
name: Poised Sword

description: Makes the user harder to target.
name: Hide

description: Below are skills mainly for sorcerers to use.
name: -----　Priest & Sorcerer Skills

description:
Increases all allies’ defense and M.Defense. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Magic Barrier

description: Greatly increases the user’s M.Attack for 5 turns.
name: Spell Enhancement

description:
Rouses all allies’ fighting spirit and increases 
attack. Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Yell

description: Inflicts damage on all enemies regardless of defense.
name: Meteor

description: Reflects magic attacks aimed at the user for 5 turns.
name: Magic Mirror

description: Below are skills mainly for martial artists to use.
name: -----　Martial Artist Skills

description: Inflicts damage and causes all enemies to lose balance.
name: Sweep

description: Cures the user from being weakened.
name: Qigong

description: Inflicts huge damage on all enemies.
name: Roundhouse Kick

description: Inflicts damage on an enemy regardless of defense.
name: Tiger Dance

description: Below are skills mainly for hunters to use.
name: -----　Hunter Skills

description: Decreases an enemy’s attack and defense.
name: Point Shot

description:
Shoots at all enemy’s footing and causes them to 
lose balance.
name: Stun Shot

description: Inflicts damage on an enemy 5 times.
name: Team Shot

description: Inflicts damage on all enemies 2 times.
name: Rain Shot

description: Below are skills mainly for hunters to use.
name: ----- BUFFS AND DEBUFFS

description:
Increases an ally’s attack. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Weapon Breath

description:
Decreases all enemies’ attacks. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Weapon Curse

description:
Increases an ally’s defense. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Armor Breath

description:
Decreases all enemies’ defense. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Armor Curse

description:
Increases an ally’s M.Attack. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Spirit Breath

description:
Decreases all enemies’ M.Attack. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Spirit Curse

description:
Increases an ally’s M.Defense. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Divine Breath

description:
Decreases all enemies’ M.Defense. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Divine Curse

description:
Increases an ally’s agility. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Quicken Movement

description:
Decreases all enemies’ agility. 
Usable up to 2 times in a row.
name: Slow Movement

description: Absorbs HP from an enemy.
name: Life Drain

description: Absorbs MP from an enemy.
name: Mana Drain

description: Bestows fire attributes for 5 turns.
name: Ember Blade

description: Bestows ice attributes for 5 turns.
name: Frozen Blade

description: Bestows thunder attributes for 5 turns.
name: Lightning Blade

description: Bestows light attributes for 5 turns.
name: Wirlwind Blade

description: Bestows Light attributes for 5 turns.
name: Holy Blade

description: Bestows Darkness attributes for 5 turns.
name: Shaded Blade

description: Bestows Arcane attributes for 5 turns.
name: Arcane Blade

description:
Rouses the user’s fighting spirit and fortifies 
their abilities.
name: Howl

description: Bash against the target twice
name: Rage
note: BeastKin preferred melee attack

description: Inflicts damage and causes an enemy to lose balance.
name: Charge

description: Bash against the target trice
name: Wild Rage
note: BeastKin preferred melee attack

description: Covers an enemy in slime and lowers their agility.
name: Slime down

description: Covers several enemies in slime and lowers their agility.
name: Slime All

description: Absorbs MP from an enemy.
